tasks.task: Installing a solar panel system on a roof.
subtasks: Obtaining and arranging solar system components including a 295 watt solar panel, microinverter, performance meter, AC disconnect, mounting racks, combiner, and wire connections.
Measuring and layout of solar panel positions on the roof, ensuring appropriate spacing and secure fastener placement.
Assembling and securing solar panel mounting racks to the roof using drill holes, string lines, and couplings.
Installing individual microinverters for each solar panel and connecting their DC wires to the panels.
Connecting AC wires from the microinverters to J-boxes and using conduit to run wires down to the combiner box and AC disconnect.
Assembling the combiner box and connecting wires from multiple strings to aggregate power.
Testing the system under partial cloud cover and observing initial power output and performance tracking.

tasks.task: The main task is **MAINTASK: Installing a solar panel system on a roof**. This involves several subtasks:
